node1.PC_Text: Hey, it's Mikey the Muscle! How are you this morning?
There he is! The one who puts the 'man' in "manager" ...

A.NPC_Response: Nice to meet you. Are you settling in ok?

A.PC_Text: So you're the boss man.  The head honcho. The big cheese.
A.NPC_Response: Um yes. I am the manager.

A.PC_Text: You must be Mike. I've heard so much about you! Is it true you have a tattoo of a koala in a hard hat on your chest?

B.PC_Text: I'm Annie. I just started this week.
B.NPC_Response: Oh. Nice to meet you Annie. Please, just call me Mike.

B.PC_Text: I'm Annie. You must work out a lot.
I'm Annie. Rumor around the office is that you can benchpress a car.

C.PC_Text: Sorry, I'm just really excited to talk with you.
What? No one's ever said that to you before?
C.NPC_Response: No, and I'd prefer no one ever did again.

C.PC_Text: The middleweight champion of middle management, the master of the margins …

AA.NPC_Response: Happy to hear it.I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AA.PC_Text: Aye aye, captain. I'm full steam ahead!
AA.NPC_Response: Oh, that's great. Glad to hear it.  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AA.PC_Text: Yep! I haven't had a welcome this warm since my trip to the Bahamas!
AA.NPC_Response: Oh, great. Glad to hear it. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AB.NPC_Response: Um, thanks? Anyway, I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AB.PC_Text: How about I call you "the big kahuna?"
AB.NPC_Response: You can call me Mike.  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers?

AB.PC_Text: The grande enchilada. The burger king. The manwich! Wow I'm hungry.
AB.NPC_Response: That really is not necessary. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AC.PC_Text: Oh, my bad. I must be thinking of someone else.
AC.NPC_Response: I should think so. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.
I don't know what you're talking about.  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

AC.PC_Text: Aw, you're just being modest. Open your shirt and let me see!
AC.NPC_Response: Absolutely not. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BA.PC_Text: Will do. Good to meet you Mike.
BA.NPC_Response: You too. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.
Just Mike, please.  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BA.PC_Text: What about Mike the Mountain? Or maybe His Majesty Mike of the Manly Arms?
BA.NPC_Response: Please just stop.  Anyway, I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BB.NPC_Response: Lucky guess. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BB.PC_Text: How fast can you run a mile?
BB.NPC_Response: I don't think that's any of your business. Anyway, I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BB.PC_Text: I used to work out a lot. They used to call me All-American Ankle Annie on account of my massive ankles.
BB.NPC_Response: hat's quite a nickname. Anyway, I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BC.PC_Text: You know, a car. Oh, did you mean me? I'm the new hire.
BC.NPC_Response: I see. Welcome. I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BC.PC_Text: Oooh, you look so tense. Are you stretching after lifting? You need to relax or you'll pull something!
BC.NPC_Response: This really is none of your business. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

BC.PC_Text: Can I touch your bicep? Or tricep? Oh! How about the deltoid?
BC.NPC_Response: I should think not!  I hope you settle in OK and get to know your coworkers.

CA.PC_Text: Because I'm Annie and I am going to be your new analyst!
CA.NPC_Response: Welcome to the team.  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.
Yes, I know. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CA.PC_Text: I'm  just excited to work with you. I dreamed of becoming a professional lion tamer but the market is just really saturated right now.
CA.NPC_Response: I don't even know what to say to that. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CB.NPC_Response: I hope so. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CB.PC_Text: Sorry, sometimes I can't resist a good alliteration.
CB.NPC_Response: Try. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CB.PC_Text: Understood. Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.
CB.NPC_Response: What secret? Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CC.PC_Text: Oh, sorry. Sometimes I get carried away.
CC.NPC_Response: Apparently. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CC.PC_Text: Are you sure? I didn't even get to the best part yet.
CC.NPC_Response: Yes, I'm sure. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.

CC.PC_Text: IT'S THE ONE, THE ONLY, MONETARY MEASUREMENT MIKE!
CC.NPC_Response: That's enough. Anyway,  I hope you settle in OK and have a chance to get to know your coworkers.
